question: What is Starknet.js?
answer: Starknet.js is a JavaScript/TypeScript library designed to connect your website or decentralized application (D-App) to Starknet. It aims to mimic the architecture of ethers.js, so if you are familiar with ethers, you should find Starknet.js easy to work with.
